Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.Basic_stuff.generators.generators3

[docs]def power(values):
    for value in values:
        print("Power : %s" % value)
        yield value




[docs]def adder(values):
    for value in values:
        print("add to %s" % value)
        if value % 2 == 0:
            yield value + 3
        else:
            yield value + 2



if __name__ == "__main__":

    l = [1, 2, 4, 6, 17, 12, 5, 7]

    x = adder(power(l))

    for i in l:
        print(next(x))
